unified_fields.name: pathway_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier assigned by each database to reference a biological pathway

unified_fields.name: pathway_name
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Display name describing the biological pathway or process

unified_fields.name: organism
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Taxonomic organism for which the pathway is annotated

unified_fields.name: gene_entries
unified_fields.description: Genes/gene products participating in the pathway
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Collection of gene or gene product entities that participate in the pathway reactions

unified_fields.name: compound_entries
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Small molecules, metabolites, or chemical compounds involved in pathway reactions

unified_fields.name: reactions
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Molecular transformations that convert substrates to products within the pathway

unified_fields.name: cross_references
unified_fields.semantic_definition: References to corresponding entries in other biological databases

KEGG.name: relation_subtype
KEGG.description: Specific interaction type (activation, inhibition, phosphorylation, etc.)

KEGG.name: graphics
KEGG.description: Visual rendering properties (x, y coordinates, colors)

unified_fields.name: uri
unified_fields.description: Unique resource identifier for the entity
unified_fields.semantic_definition: BioPAX URI serving as the primary identifier

unified_fields.name: displayName
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary display name for pathway or entity

unified_fields.name: organism
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Taxonomic organism context

unified_fields.name: dataSource
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Attribution to contributing database

unified_fields.name: interactor_A_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary protein identifier for interactor A

unified_fields.name: interactor_B_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Primary protein identifier for interactor B

unified_fields.name: gene_symbol_A
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Official gene symbol (HGNC for human)

unified_fields.name: gene_symbol_B
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Official gene symbol (HGNC for human)

unified_fields.name: detection_method
unified_fields.description: Experimental method used to detect interaction
unified_fields.semantic_definition: PSI-MI controlled vocabulary term for detection method

unified_fields.name: interaction_type
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Classification of the interaction (physical, genetic, functional)

unified_fields.name: publication_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Literature reference for the interaction evidence

unified_fields.name: organism_A
unified_fields.description: NCBI taxonomy ID for interactor A
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Taxonomic identifier for species of interactor A

unified_fields.name: organism_B
unified_fields.description: NCBI taxonomy ID for interactor B
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Taxonomic identifier for species of interactor B

unified_fields.name: confidence_score
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Numerical confidence measure (scale varies by source)

BioGRID.name: BioGRID_ID_A
BioGRID.description: BioGRID internal ID for interactor A

BioGRID.name: BioGRID_ID_B
BioGRID.description: BioGRID internal ID for interactor B

IntAct.name: stoichiometry_A
IntAct.description: Number of molecules of participant A

unified_fields.name: chemical_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: PubChem CID-based identifier with prefix (CIDm/CIDs)

unified_fields.name: protein_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Protein identifier in taxid.ENSP format

unified_fields.name: chemical_name
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Common or IUPAC name of the compound

unified_fields.name: combined_score
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Integrated score from all evidence channels

action_types.description: Physical binding without clear functional effect

unified_fields.name: term_id
unified_fields.description: Primary identifier for the ontology term or gene set
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier for functional annotation term

unified_fields.name: term_name
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Display name for the ontology term or gene set

unified_fields.name: description
unified_fields.description: Definition or description of the term
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Detailed textual definition of the functional concept

examples.Gene Ontology: The chemical reactions and pathways, including anabolism and catabolism...
examples.MSigDB: Genes mediating programmed cell death (apoptosis) by activation of caspases.

unified_fields.name: genes
unified_fields.semantic_definition: List of genes annotated to or members of the term

MSigDB.name: numGenes
MSigDB.description: Number of genes in the set

unified_fields.name: element_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier for TF binding motif or chromatin region

unified_fields.name: name
unified_fields.description: Name of the element or sample
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Human-readable identifier

unified_fields.name: species
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Taxonomic species for the data

families: Nuclear receptors with C4 zinc fingers

gene_identifiers.description: Common gene/protein identifiers used across multiple sources
